alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Lowndes (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 30 at 9:41PM EDT until September 02 at 11:00AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Tallahassee FL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Georgia... Withlacoochee River above Valdosta (Skipper Bridge Rd) affecting Lowndes and Brooks Counties. For the Withlacoochee River...including Valdosta (Skipper Bridge Rd), Quitman (US 84), Pinetta (CR 150)...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY EVENING TO LATE SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Withlacoochee River above Valdosta (Skipper Bridge Rd). * WHEN...From Thursday evening to late Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 127.5 feet, The river rises out of the bank near the Lowndes and Cook County line. At 135.0 feet, Minor flooding begins. Langdale Park floods. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 PM EDT Wednesday the stage was 131.3 feet. - Bankfull stage is 6.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow evening to a crest of 135.2 feet early Friday morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Friday evening. - Flood stage is 135.0 feet. - Flood History...No available flood history. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Thursday evening at 1100 PM EDT.
